text:
Before transitioning into technical and media-heavy roles, Jof Davies developed customer-facing and operational discipline through early employment.

Cineworld (2003–2005): Provided operational grounding in customer service, shift management, and process discipline.

Barclaycard (2005–2006): Required accuracy, data handling, and adherence to regulated workflows.

These early positions strengthened interpersonal communication and dependable execution, forming a foundation for later technical and systems engineering roles.
